Package it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class SetUpController

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.controller.SetUpController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Controller, Observer<PlayerChoice>
public class SetUpController
extends java.lang.Object
implements Controller
Class handles the God selection phase of each player through the following methods:

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    SetUpController​(Model model, java.util.List<java.lang.String> players, java.util.List<RemoteView> views)
    Constructor initializes the players, to each player different (unique) RemoteView is opted.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addPlayer​(java.lang.String player)
    Deprecated.
    void handle​(PlayerChoice message)
    used to communicate with the player in selecting the God.
    void update​(PlayerChoice message)
    Method is used to notify player, while current player gets the messages according to his/her step, other players who try to do something get the message while it is not their turn

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • handle

      public void handle​(PlayerChoice message) throws java.lang.Error
      used to communicate with the player in selecting the God. After having selected the Game Gods successfully currentController of the specific Remote View (=player) switches to GameController
      Parameters:
      message -
      Throws:
      java.lang.Error - if unexpected behaviour is done

    • update

      public void update​(PlayerChoice message)
      Method is used to notify player, while current player gets the messages according to his/her step, other players who try to do something get the message while it is not their turn
      Specified by:
      update in interface Observer<PlayerChoice>
      Parameters:
      message -
